articles.title: Jhingan parts ways with Sibenik, returns to ATK Mohun Bagan - Times of India
articles.description: Panaji: Sandesh Jhingan has mutually parted ways with HNK Sibenik and will complete a move to ATK Mohun Bagan in the next 24 hours.

articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping called for efforts to ensure the success of the Beijing 2022 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games while inspecting the preparations for the Games recently.
